item.title: Deploy Prisma to AWS Fargate with Terraform
item.description: A recent project that I worked on introduced Prisma to our stack, an ORM-like layer that does the heavy lifting in your GraphQL server. Rather than diving deep into what Prisma is and how it operates, this post will guide you through using Terraform to automate & deploy the entire stack — The Prisma server & the AWS resources needed to support it. If you prefer using CloudFormation for IaaC, you’re in luck!
